actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans requested executive comment from VA; OMB.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to enhance the quality of care for veterans in medical facilities operated by the Veterans' Administration by insuring the provision of such care and necessary related services by Federal employees.

summary.text: Requires that all activities carried out at a medical facility under the direct jurisdiction of the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs be performed by Federal employees, except as specified.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to enhance the quality of care for veterans in medical facilities operated by the Veterans' Administration by insuring the provision of such care and necessary related services by Federal employees.
